knimeNode.name: Cumulocity Events Creator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates one event from each row of the given table

fullDescription.intro: Connect to the Cumulocity events API and create one event from each row of the given table
fullDescription.option: Type of event to report. Use cot_abc_xyz style. (required)
Name of the source that created this event. Typically the device name. (optional)
ID of the source that created this event. Typically this is the id of the originating device. (required)
Time this event was raised. If not set, then the current system time is used. (optional, expected type: 'ZonedDateTime')

ports.inPort: Data describing the respective events to be created.
